entry.title: TATTOOING Close Up (in Slow Motion) - Smarter Every Day 122

media:group.media:description:
Free Audio Book ⇒ http://bit.ly/AudibleSED Tweet⇒http://bit.ly/SEDTattoo FB⇒http://bit.ly/SEDTattooFB More info! ⇊ Click below for more links! ⇊ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Official comment thread on Reddit here: http://bit.ly/Y2S7wl
I hope this video helps break a few of your stereotypes. I found that most Tattoo artists that I dealt with were very courteous professionals.
Shot with a Phantom Miro Camera http://bit.ly/NewPhantomMiro
To help with understanding, we've created animated GIFs (we call them InfoGIFs) You can view them on the Smarter Every Day Tumblr http://smartereveryday.tumblr.com/
A huge thanks to Seejay and Leah at Timepiece Tattoo. They were open and welcoming to some random nerd who asked if he could hang out and film in their shop. Seejay and Leah Tattoo here http://timepiecetattoocompany.com/
Leah's work can be seen here: http://leahfarrow.com/
I like following Leah on Instagram, she posts fresh tattoos almost daily, as well as her original sketches and artwork. http://instagram.com/spittingwisdom Seejay (guy that did the macaroni tattoo) and the owner of the shop. http://instagram.com/timepiecetattooco http://instagram.com/seejay256
While you're at it, I have an instagram account too. I like to post rockets and interesting observations I make. I reserve the right to post "proud Dad" pictures. http://instagram.com/smartereveryday
The close up needle shots were shot at "Tattoos Forever" in Fort Walton Beach, FL. Albert and Jeff helped me by setting up the needles and explaining everything to me. The guys there were SUPER helpful, very professional and cooperative. http://www.tattoosforever.com/
The awesome piano music by "A Shell In The Pit" is called: "Explodeface, Destroyer of Worlds" It can be downloaded here. https://ashellinthepit.bandcamp.com/album/smarter-every-day-vol-ii
Awesome coil and electromagnetic field graphic elements by Graphic Designer Emily Weddle http://emilyweddle.com/
Outro Music is "Bottles" by A Shell In The Pit. Download them here: http://ashellinthepit.bandcamp.com/track/minke-bottles
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Tweet ideas to me https://twitter.com/smartereveryday I'm also on Instagram, Facebook, and Reddit http://instagram.com/smartereveryday https://www.facebook.com/SmarterEveryDay http://www.reddit.com/r/smartereveryday
If you like what I do and want to support my efforts to create Smart kids and Smarter Every Day here are a couple of links you can use to help. You will be notified when every single video is released! Patreon Support Link: http://www.patreon.com/smartereveryday Subbable Support Link: http://subbable.com/smartereveryday
Warm Regards,
Destin
media:group.media:title: TATTOOING Close Up (in Slow Motion) - Smarter Every Day 122

entry.title: Unbelievable! Epic Fail from Less than Two Metres!

media:group.media:description:
It was an unbelievable scene from matchday 7 in Bundesliga 2. Kaiserslautern's Philipp Hofmann managed to put the ball over the bar from less than 2 metres! The only thing that saved his blushes was the fact that Kaiserslautern went on to win 1-0 against Union Berlin.
The Official Bundesliga YouTube channel gives you access to clips from Germany's football league that you won't find anywhere else. Visit us at www.youtube.com/bundesliga to see what all the noise is about! Subscribe now! http://goo.gl/MuJEUZ
media:group.media:title: Unbelievable! Epic Fail from Less than Two Metres!

media:group.media:description:
KLM’s dedicated Lost & Found team at Amsterdam Airport Schiphol is on a mission to reunite lost items as soon as possible with their legitimate owner. From a teddy bear found by the cabin crew to a laptop left in the lounge. Locating the owners can sometimes be a challenge, so special forces have been hired… And remember: if it happens to you, the KLM Social Media team is always there for you on Facebook and Twitter!
http://www.klm.com http://www.facebook.com/klm http://www.twitter.com/klm https://www.linkedin.com/company/klm
----
Transcript: Yes, it's a lot of fun. Personally I think he is a real asset to the company. And he can really do something no one else can. Our main goal is to return lost items to the owner. As fast as possible. To do that, we monitor social media. And the crew checks the plane after every flight. I really like the fact that we are now getting some help with that. We train for muscle strength, endurance, and of course socialization. When you see the reactions of the passengers that really is amazing. He drops by regularly but I have to admit: I do spoil him a bit.
media:group.media:title: KLM Lost & Found service

entry.title: Exploring the Universe: Crash Course Big History #2

media:group.media:description:
In which John Green, Hank Green, and Emily Graslie teach you about what happened in the Universe after the big bang. They'll teach you about cosmic background radiation, how a bunch of hydrogen and helium turned into stars, formed galaxies, created heavy elements, and eventually created planets.
For more information, visit http://www.bighistoryproject.com
media:group.media:title: Exploring the Universe: Crash Course Big History #2

Cause he's my only hope for tonight, won't back down, won't open my eyes Keep the wookie until morning light, cause Han Solo is in carbonite Chewie's my only hope for tonight, won't back down, won't open my eyes Keep the wookie until morning light, cause Han Solo is in carbonite In Carbonite
Han is gone, I'm a mess I'd just as soon, a Wookie kiss Oh is he tame, is he tame?
1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3, wink 1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3, wink 1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3, wink
Feel the fuzz, until he growls
I'm gonna swing, from his Bandolier, from his Bandolier I'm gonna live, like Han Solo doesn't exist Like he doesn't exist I'm gonna fly like the Falcon's hyperdrive, With Chewbacca by my side I'm gonna swing, from his Bandolier, from his Bandolier
Cause he's my only hope for tonight, won't back down, won't open my eyes Keep the wookie until morning light, cause Han Solo is in carbonite Chewie's my only hope for tonight, won't back down, won't open my eyes Keep the wookie until morning light, cause Han Solo is in carbonite In Carbonite
Him for tonight Chewie's my only hope for tonight Oh, I’m just holding him for tonight Him for tonight Him for tonight Cause Han Solo is in carbonite Chewie's my only hope for tonight Oh I'm just holding him for tonight Him for tonight Him for tonight

entry.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver: Miss America Pageant (HBO)

media:group.media:description:
The Miss America Pageant…how is this still a thing? They claim to give more scholarships to women than any other organization, and, unfortunately, they’re right. To illustrate these problems, John Oliver stages his own pageant with the help of Kathy Griffin.
Here are the links to the women's scholarship funds that John mentioned on air: Society of Women Engineers: http://societyofwomenengineers.swe.org/ Jeanette Rankin Women’s Scholarship Fund: www.rankinfoundation.org Patsy Mink Foundation: www.patsyminkfoundation.org
Connect with Last Week Tonight online... Subscribe to the Last Week Tonight YouTube channel for more almost news as it almost happens: www.youtube.com/user/LastWeekTonight
Find Last Week Tonight on Facebook like your mom would: http://Facebook.com/LastWeekTonight
Follow us on Twitter for news about jokes and jokes about news: http://Twitter.com/LastWeekTonight
Visit our official site for all that other stuff at once: http://www.hbo.com/last-week-tonight-with-john-oliver
media:group.media:title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver: Miss America Pageant (HBO)

entry.title: Fake Hand Ass Pinch Prank - THE REVEAL (part 3/3)

media:group.media:description:
Both the video that i previously shot we're STAGED and SCRIPTED, each person was told before exactly what to say, exactly what i was going to do and exactly how to react to make people who viewed video react the way they did. regardless of this, and the people being actors, the videos have caused upset to a lot of people, which i'm sorry for, i have removed the 2 videos so as not to cause any more upset to them people.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
MORE INFO + HELP:
Male Domestic Abuse Info - http://www.helpguide.org/mental/domestic-violence-men-abused-by-women.htm
Female Domestic Abuse Info - http://www.helpguide.org/mental/domestic_violence_abuse_types_signs_causes_effects.htm
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please RT my tweet to gain awareness of the Campaign and follow me for updates.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Jade instagram - http://www.instagram.com/_jadeybaby
Mikaela instagram - http://www.instagram.com/mikaelakatrina
i'd also love to thank all of the other parties involved for all their help!
media:group.media:title: Fake Hand Ass Pinch Prank - THE REVEAL (part 3/3)

entry.title: Less Attractive Rob Lowe DIRECTV Commercial

media:group.media:description:
Less Attractive Rob Lowe shows a comparison of Rob Lowe’s DIRECTV service vs. Less Attractive Rob Lowe’s cable service. Rob Lowe enjoys 1080p TV and Dolby 5.1 in his home. Less Attractive Rob Lowe loses out with basic cable services and misses out on all the perks DIRECTV service has to offer.
Upgrade to DIRECTV today and get the best deal http://bit.ly/1uz98Ja.
media:group.media:title: Less Attractive Rob Lowe DIRECTV Commercial
